p: All the FIV Pol protein sequences have been extracted from GenBank. These sequences have been aligned with the BioEdit software [ 225]. Phylogenetic analyses were performed using the Neighbor-Joining (NJ) method [ 226] in PHYLIP version 3.6 alpha 3 [ 227] accessed at . Robustness of nodes was estimated by running a bootstrap test with 100 replicates.
